Package com.atakmap.android.radiolibrary

Interface RoverInterface.RadioListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RoverDropDownReceiver
    Enclosing interface:
    RoverInterface
    public static interface RoverInterface.RadioListener
    Allows for a registered receiver to get command output, input, status, and preset information when changed.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void log​(java.lang.String tag, java.lang.String message)
      Provides log style messages from the library.
      void onMciStatus​(int status)
      Incoming status for the Radio.
      void onMcoStatus​(int status)
      Outgoing sending status for the Radio.
      void onReceivePresets​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> presets)
      Callback when the preset list is returned after a succesful command to solicit the presets.
      void onReceiverStatus​(RoverInterface.Receiver r)
      Provides the heartbeat status for the device based on the solicited response (automatically done with a static period after monitoring has been started.

    • Method Detail

      • onMcoStatus

        void onMcoStatus​(int status)
        Outgoing sending status for the Radio. This is only useful for describing the outgoing data from the end user device to the Rover. OK=1, TIMEOUT=2, ERROR=3, STOPPED=4

      • onMciStatus

        void onMciStatus​(int status)
        Incoming status for the Radio. Monitors the receipt of incoming packets and when there are consecutive losses where packets are expected, then the status moves from TIMEOUT to ERROR. OK=1, TIMEOUT=2, ERROR=3, STOPPED=4

      • onReceiverStatus

        void onReceiverStatus​(RoverInterface.Receiver r)
        Provides the heartbeat status for the device based on the solicited response (automatically done with a static period after monitoring has been started.

      • onReceivePresets

        void onReceivePresets​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> presets)
        Callback when the preset list is returned after a succesful command to solicit the presets.

      • log

        void log​(java.lang.String tag,
         java.lang.String message)
        Provides log style messages from the library.
